Description: Handle of Thasian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.122, 3. Names, Leog(oras) and Aisch(ines) or Aisch(rion). The type is as Garlan, Y., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos. 1, Timbres protothasiens et thasiens anciens (Paris 1999), no. 154, though the date should be well before 350 BC.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0023)
